description: 125 Front-end / Web / JavaScript / Mobile / IoT developers and decision makers
Mostly from the Southwest UK, with some from through the UK, Europe and beyond
schedule: HalfStack starts around 10am, includes approximately 8-10 sessions, breaks, lunch, dinner, and an interactive afterparty. Plan to arrive by 10am and stay late! We're also expecting to have fun at the beach on Saturday, so plan to stay the whole weekend! Sessions will be announced closer to the event.

description: HalfStack provides the ultimate showcase for side projects, so let’s talk about…  joining a cult (or side projects, and how to do them right). We'll cover the 13 principles of the Cult of Done manifesto, written by Bre Pettis and Kio Stark, and how to practically apply them in software engineering and other creative endeavours!
sessions.title: Let’s talk about…  joining a cult (or side projects, and how to do them right)

description: Want to share something you've been working on lately? Spend 2-3 minutes on stage sharing your project! First-come, first-served sign-ups on the day of the event.
sessions.title: Lightning Talks

description: We will kick off the afterparty with Battledecks, a tech improv game. You have 5 minutes to pitch a fake tech startup from a randomly generated slide deck. Then we'll proceed in teams with our unique JS Pub Quiz! If there's interest, we'll conclude with karaoke.
sessions.title: Afterparty (JS Pub Quiz and more)
